page.title: 13SECONDARY SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: I get up for for school at about 7.30 and have my breakfast and wash. I leave for school around 8.15 to arrive at 8.30. The firt bell goes at 8.50 and that's for registration. Then there may be an assembly if it is Thursday.Then it is first lesson. Next bell for break is then heard at 10.25 followed by 20 minutes break, and into 2nd period. This ends at 11.50 and then it is lunch time.At the moment I go home for dinner because of the teachers' dispute. The next bell is for afternoon registration and then into the 3rd period, which lasts for 1hr. 10 minutes.The last period starts at 2.20pm and lasts to 3.30pm and then we can go home. In the Littlehampton we have many subjects, eg. English, Maths, P.E., French and German.
